summary: This is an email chain from August 14, 2019, discussing the scheduling of a meeting at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) regarding Jeffrey Epstein. The meeting is to involve senior officials ('the brass'), an MCC team, and representatives from Main Justice, the FBI, and possibly the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Geoff is the person who requested the meeting at the MCC regarding Epstein, to be attended by senior officials and various agency representatives.

events.title: MCC/Epstein Meeting
events.description: A meeting is scheduled to take place at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) regarding Jeffrey Epstein, involving senior officials ('the brass'), an MCC team, and representatives from Main Justice, the FBI, and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

locations: 8th floor library (presumably at the MCC or a related facility)
keyFacts: A high-level meeting regarding Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for August 15, 2019, at the MCC.
The meeting was to involve senior officials ('the brass'), an MCC team, and representatives from Main Justice, the FBI, and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email chain demonstrates coordination between the MCC and federal law enforcement/justice officials regarding Epstein while he was in custody.
